title: OPEC+ Signals Steady Output as Demand Firms
summary: Producers hold steady into Q4 as refinery runs lift seaborne crude flows.
content_html:
OPEC+ delegates indicated a steady approach into the winter maintenance period. Refinery runs have lifted seaborne flows while physical differentials firm in the Atlantic basin.

Backwardation narrowed and the curve flattened as prompt demand improved.

title: Smelter Curbs Tighten Global Aluminium Spreads
summary: Power constraints reduce output and widen premia in Europe and Asia.
content_html: Rolling power constraints continue to limit smelter output, pushing spot premia higher. Downstream demand remains resilient despite price volatility.

title: Weather Swings Drive Volatility in Corn
summary: Yield uncertainty rises as forecasts flip between heat and storms.
content_html: Weather models turned mixed week-on-week, lifting realized volatility across corn options. End-users continue to hedge new-crop exposure amid basis moves.

title: EU ETS: Options Skew Hints at Tighter Q4
summary: Risk reversals price in upside into year-end amid supply adjustments.
content_html: Positioning in the options market shows a mild upside skew, reflecting expectations for tighter balances into Q4.
